name: Calling Police
description:
Calling police with siren sound and police car image.
joke to your friend. girlfriend or boyfriend. boss. etc.
telephone conversation with original phone ringing.
plan a fake call.
phone call on your device.

Calling Police Features:

* sound of answering service of Police .
* options to Decline or accept call.
* variety of Police pictures.
* simulate fake incoming call from Police place.
* easy to use.
* For all Ages.
